text: Young Gods (Finnish title: Hymypoika), is a 2003 film from Finland. The film centres on a group of Finnish teenagers who begin to make videos of themselves and others having sex. Their adventures become more and more extreme, eventually leading to tragic consequences. It was directed by Jukka-Pekka Siili and stars Jussi Nikkilä. The movie is available in the United States from Picture This! Entertainment. ==External links== * Category:2003 films Category:Finnish films Category:Films directed by JP Siili Category:2000s teen films
title: Young Gods (film)
